name: Youwei Zhuo
content: Youwei ZhuoYouwei ZhuoAssistant ProfessorPeking UniversityYouwei Zhuo (å“æœ‰ä¸º) is a tenure-track assistant professor at Peking University, leading LEMONADE, Lab of Emerging Memory Optimizations for Next-generation Architecture Design and Exploration. Before joining Peking University, he was a research scientist at Alibaba DAMO Academy. He received a BE degree in computer science and a BA degree in economics from Tsinghua University. He received his PhD degree in computer science from University of Southern California under the supervision of Prof. Xuehai Qian.His research interest is computer architecture, including novel memory architectures and distributed systems for large-scale graph processing and machine learning. His research work has been published and presented in several top conferences, including PLDI, MICRO, HPCA, and ASPLOS.Research InterestsComputer architectureHigh-performance computingElectronic Design automationI am actively looking for PhD students and undergraduate interns.
